### getSystemRegistryString() {#a721a1e2b9fcfe5e633cb413a6eabed8b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool getSystemRegistryString (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; keyPath, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; valueName, <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#ae2b0d0345572d6718e219aa76d1d54edab45cffe084dd3d20d928bee85e7b0f21">std::string</a> &amp; value, <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#ae2b0d0345572d6718e219aa76d1d54edab45cffe084dd3d20d928bee85e7b0f21">std::string</a> &#42; phValue)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Read registry string.

This also supports a means to look for high-versioned keys by use of a $VERSION placeholder in the key path. $VERSION in the key path is a placeholder for the version number, causing the highest value path to be searched for and used. I.e. &quot;SOFTWARE\\\\Microsoft\\\\VisualStudio\\\\$VERSION&quot;. There can be additional characters in the component. Only the numeric characters are compared. This function only searches HKLM.

Definition at line <a href="#l00175">175</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/windowsdriver/msvcpaths-cpp">MSVCPaths.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Read registry string.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This also supports a means to look for high-versioned keys by use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// of a $VERSION placeholder in the key path.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// $VERSION in the key path is a placeholder for the version number,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// causing the highest value path to be searched for and used.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// I.e. &quot;SOFTWARE\\\\Microsoft\\\\VisualStudio\\\\$VERSION&quot;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// There can be additional characters in the component.  Only the numeric</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// characters are compared.  This function only searches HKLM.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175" lineLink="#a721a1e2b9fcfe5e633cb413a6eabed8b"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a721a1e2b9fcfe5e633cb413a6eabed8b">getSystemRegistryString</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;keyPath, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;valueName,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                    std::string &amp;value, std::string &#42;phValue) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef &#95;WIN32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  HKEY hRootKey = HKEY&#95;LOCAL&#95;MACHINE;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  HKEY hKey = NULL;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">long</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> lResult;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> returnValue = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;placeHolder = strstr(keyPath, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;$VERSION&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::string bestName;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we have a $VERSION placeholder, do the highest-version search.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (placeHolder) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;keyEnd = placeHolder - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;nextKey = placeHolder;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find end of previous key.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((keyEnd &gt; keyPath) &amp;&amp; (&#42;keyEnd != </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\\\&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">      keyEnd--;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find end of key containing $VERSION.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (&#42;nextKey &amp;&amp; (&#42;nextKey != </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\\\&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">      nextKey++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> partialKeyLength = keyEnd - keyPath;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> partialKey&#91;256&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (partialKeyLength &gt;= </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(partialKey))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">      partialKeyLength = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(partialKey) - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">    strncpy(partialKey, keyPath, partialKeyLength);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::optional&lt;std::string&gt; PathEnv = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#a8806fc38b760a88a96d5d7fb67de545f">sys::Process::GetEnv</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;PATH&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
